description: If you’re looking for something easy and meat-free, try these curried chickpea patties. They’re great on a salad, with a dipping sauce or in a wrap.
keywords: Vegie burger,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Quick & easy lunch,Sesame free,Dairy free,Potato
name: Curried Chickpea Patties Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Gather all ingredients together. Select a large frypan.
Into a large bowl, add Chickpeas, with a fork, squish them down, whilst leaving some whole for that rustic look.
Add all other ingredients (except the oil for the frypan), and mix well to combine.

Roll into whatever shape or size you desire. I usually flatten mine down forming a pattie shape. My mixture makes about 11 patties. You can make these ahead of time, just cover and rest in the fridge.
Add oil to frying pan on medium heat. Add all patties and cook on both sides for about 8 minutes (depending on size of pattie) or until nicely golden.
Serve with either a fresh garden salad for lunch or dinner or with a dipping sauce of your choice for a delicious snack.
